sentences.en: Clear off the coffee list with the single zany of the tail.
sentences.cn: 有时侯一高兴就帮你清掉咖啡桌上的杂物,就尾巴一摇就搞定了!

sentences.en: He can watch the Marx brothers'zany antics for hours.
sentences.cn: 他可以连着几个小时的看马克思兄弟的滑稽喜剧.

sentences.en: He made us all laugh with his zany tricks.
sentences.cn: 他那些滑稽的恶作剧逗得我们都大笑起来.

sentences.en: He tried lecturing in California again with great success in the style of zany inconsequence.
sentences.cn: 他在加州讲演,又非常成功,用的噱头也是模仿丑角的滑稽.

sentences.en: He tried lecturing in California, again with great success, in the Ward style of zany inconsequence.
sentences.cn: 他在加州讲演, 又非常成功, 用的噱头也是模仿沃德的.

sentences.en: Is that zany approach an advantage for you or for your viewers?
sentences.cn: 你搞那些装疯卖傻的噱头,对你,还是对你的观众有好处?

sentences.en: Michael made us all laugh with his zany tricks.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔玩儿弄各种可笑的把戏把我们都逗笑了.

sentences.en: Q: Is that zany approach an advantage for you or for your viewers?
sentences.cn: 问: 你搞那些装疯卖傻的噱头,对你,还是对你的观众有好处?

sentences.en: She made us all laugh with her zany tricks.
sentences.cn: 她那些滑稽的恶作剧逗得我们都大笑起来.

sentences.en: She's special because her coat looks zany. It is sharply divided between horse and zebra.
sentences.cn: 艾克莉丝相当与众不同,毛皮长得很逗趣,马纹与斑马纹的部分壁垒分明.

sentences.en: They threw their King Kong together with an unthinking haste that accounts for its zany illogic.
sentences.cn: 他们在一片未思索的匆忙中,匆匆把金刚凑在一起,而必须为电影的荒唐不合逻辑负责.

sentences.en: This creates very spontaneous and zany looking animation and is used for wild, scrambling action.
sentences.cn: 这就很自发故事看动画和用于野生乱行动.

sentences.en: With zany myopia, economists like to claim that the deeper cause of every thing is economic.
sentences.cn: 滑稽的是,那些缺乏远见的经济学家总喜欢宣称任何现象都根源于经济.

sentences.en: With zany myopia, economists like to claim that the deeper of cause of everything is economic.
sentences.cn: 由于目光短浅, 经济学家总是一厢情愿的认为所有问题皆由经济因素而起.
搞怪喜剧演员维克·里夫斯

trans.tran_cn: 滑稽的， 笨的，可笑的， 荒唐的
trans.tran_en: crazy or unusual in a way that is amusing
